entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 01:20 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 7. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
